abstract: Anthony Tommasini reviews world premiere of John Adams symphony Scheherazade 2, performed by New York Philharmonic at Avery Fisher Hall.
lead_paragraph: The New York Philharmonic presented the world premiere of this symphony, a response to brutality against women in Arab folklore and around the world today.

headline.main: Review: John Adams Unveils ‘Scheherazade.2,’ an Answer to Male Brutality

snippet: The New York Philharmonic presented the world premiere of this symphony, a response to brutality against women in Arab folklore and around the world today.
